Class Oval

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Oval
extends Rectangle

This class stores all the information about a oval, and manages its drawing.

Since:
15/05/2004
Version:
1
Author:
David Terei

Constructor Detail

Oval

public Oval(Point p1,
            int Stroke)
Create a new Oval.

Parameters:
p1 - The top left corner of the oval.
Stroke - The thickness of the outline of the oval.

Oval

public Oval(Point p1,
            Point dim,
            int Stroke)
Create a new Oval.

Parameters:
p1 - The top left corner of the oval.
dim - The dimension (width, height) of the oval.
Stroke - The thickness of the outline of the oval.

Create a new oval.

resize

public void resize(double times)
Description copied from class: Shape
Resize the shape, according to the double value percent, specified. This method allows shapes to be 'zoomed' in on.

Overrides:
resize in class Rectangle
Parameters:
times - The size, in decimals, for the shape to be, relative to its 'base' size. So a value of 2 will double the shape compared to its original value.
